page.title: 12A SCHOOLDAY AND A HOLIDAY.
page.content: I WAKE AT ABOUT 06.00 AND READ UNTIL I GET UP AT 08.00.I NEVER EAT BREAKFAST, AND AFTER WASHING,DRESSING AND BRUSHING MY HAIR,I GO TO BUY MY PACKED LUNCH AT THE CORNER SHOP.SCHOOL STARTS AT O9.00 USUALLY WITH MATHEMATICS BUT RECENTLY I HAVE BEEN IN A GROUP THAT HAS A WHOLE DAY WORKING ON A BBC COMPUTER ADVENTURE CALLED 'L'.IT IS HARD BUT INTERESTING AND ALL THE PROBLEMS CAN BE SOLVED USING MATHEMATICAL PROCESSES....... WHEN ON HOLIDAY I GET UP EARLY AND WATCH TV.AS A FAMILY WE SOMETIMES GO OUT TO GELT WOODS NEAR BRAMPTON FOR A PICNIC. WE STAY THERE UNTIL EVENING MAKING DENS AND TRYING TO BUILD TREE HOUSES. WE TAKE OUR WELLINGTONS AND WALK FOR MILES.WE HELP DAD BY COLLECTING BRANCHES TO BUILD THE TREE HOUSE.ONE DAY DAD HOPES TO GET A TREE HOUSE FINISHED.
